title: In recognition
creator_credit: Gerald Ashcroft, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: ‘Capturing the light and being in the moment, what more could you ask for?’ Gerald Ashcroft’s mother talked him out of giving up piano with a garden hoe. Many years on, he is grateful for that, as he is for his two beautiful daughters.
